Detailed Description

SmsParamProvider is the provider to retrieve the sms parameters as defined in GSM 11.11 V8.2.0 10.5.6. An instance of this class is part of the Apoxi Data Control. A pointer to this provider can be retrieved from the main provider via the id:

c_sms_parameter_provider_id

Following column ids are defined: c_service_center_address_id :PhoneNumberType: c_destination_address_id :PhoneNumberType: c_protocol_identifier_id :NumberType: c_data_coding_scheme_id :NumberType: c_validity_period_id :NumberType: c_sms_param_name_id :WStringType:

NOTE: Please do not instantiate this class.
